channel.title: Wind on ossem: a creative space
channel.description: Recent content in Wind on ossem: a creative space

item.title: Wind
item.description: Step into my sling. if you dare. For it’s a fun ride to ride. for a while. I admit. Maybe you should try? Just once? On you hop and Around and round we go. A blur it becomes. A flurry it yields. Where it stops. Only I know. For you’re in my sling. My witty ride. My complex side. Slide and twist. Isn’t this fun? Squirm and yell. Are you done?
